metadata.synopsis: Boss Friol yells out to her men to hold during the coup

0.speaker: Boss Friol
0.text: We just want Nine-Fingers! The rest of you swear fealty to the Zhent, and we leave you to your business.
0.context: NodeContext: Calling out to group of soldiers in a standoff. Her Zhentarim want to depose Nine-Fingers - Friol is trying to reason with the Guild not to fight.
